original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 9
overview: Ninth video installment of horror posted videos. A ryokan that has been abandoned for several years without being demolished after it went bankrupt due to poor management. Both the interior and exterior are on the verge of collapse, and it is in a state where it could collapse at any time, but it seems that many people still visit for the purpose of testing their courage... If you look next to the building, it is a large cemetery.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 9
